file_content.text: No new emergencies at the moment. Take a breather while it's relatively quiet.
Recovery teams are already transferring the cargo to a new transport. I don't think we'd still have that shipment without you.
Colonel Baramak allocated hazard pay to you for the trouble. Take it with my thanks.
I hope you're able to prevent the Republic from stealing those crystals.
Irrecoverable? Lieutenant, unless that shipment was blasted into particulate matter, it had better be delivered to this outpost by twenty-two hundred galactic standard!
Is that clear--I have to go--get it done!
Apologies, my lord, small crisis but we are handling it. How may I serve?
Just passing through.
It's a poor time to be visiting.
Agent! Apologies for that. Had a small crisis arise, we are handling it.
I doubt that.
I don't favor the odds either, but I'm not going to just roll over and give the Republic a victory.
What, bounty hunter? I've got a batch of fires to put out.
Yes? What is it? I've got a crisis on my hands.
Explain the problem.
I'll assist you.
Did the colonel send you? It doesn't matter. Any help is welcome.
Don't take it out on me.
You're right, it's not your fault. This was a major setback.
A large shipment of raw crystal was intercepted on route to the outpost. We'll lose it to the Republic unless it's secured.
Consider it done.
I'll make them pay.
It'll be dangerous. I've diverted what forces I could, but the Republic is moving on the shipment's position fast.
It'll be fine. [Refuse quest]
Well, it's my duty to be concerned.
Wait a--I'm receiving reports--can't talk.
